title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.147 - Funded reserve
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.147 - Funded reserve

State Regulations
A pension reserve, a reserve for bonuses or for the
retirement of preferred stock, or other prospective future liability against
which certain assets have been accumulated and set aside or
earmarked. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.147

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
